title: Blow Cover
description: A theft ring embedded in corporate security requires extreme measures, including an optional catastrophic G choice.

scenes.narrative: The theft ring has infiltrated corporate security at multiple levels. Their operation is deeply embedded.

choices.label: Build alliances with trustworthy security personnel.
choices.consequence: Internal allies provide intelligence on the ring's operations.

choices.label: Map the ring's communication patterns.
choices.consequence: Communication analysis reveals the ring's command structure.

choices.label: Infiltrate their communication network.
choices.consequence: Network infiltration provides real-time intelligence on their plans.

choices.label: The ring's too deep - burn it all to start over.
choices.consequence: Catastrophic reset: cover blown, safe house extraction, investigation board reset. Grants SHARD_S01_01.

scenes.narrative: Gasket appears, triggered by timing skew and siren tones. The ring is preparing their final move.

choices.label: Coordinate a multi-agency takedown.
choices.consequence: Coordinated effort disrupts the ring without catastrophic damage.

choices.label: Time the disruption to minimize collateral damage.
choices.consequence: Precise timing prevents the ring's final operation.

choices.label: Deploy comprehensive surveillance network.
choices.consequence: Surveillance captures the entire ring's operations for prosecution.

choices.label: The skew clusters around custody - this is the pattern.
choices.consequence: You recognize the timing anomaly pattern, strengthening the shadow investigation.

gasket_fragment.sensory: tinnitus ring; elevator chime wrong note
